title: The Story of COVID-19 in India EDA and Prediction
description: The Story of COVID-19 in IndiaThe COVID-19 pandemic is the defining global health crisis of our time and the greatest global humanitarian challenge the world has faced since World War II. The virus has spread widely, and the number of cases is rising daily as governments work to slow its spread. India has moved quickly, implementing a proactive, nationwide, lockdown, with the goal of flattening the curve and using the time to plan and resource responses adequately.
